document_data.mainbody:
The Room of the Red Banner was a room in Castle Obarskyr, Suzail.
The room was in Castle Obarskyr, Suzail.
The nobleman Nethglas Stormserpent had pranked the nobility by taking the Wyverntongue Chalice from the Room of the Red Banner to a room near the Dragonskull Chamber at some point on or prior to .
